mapper.sql: f_id, f_title, f_subtitle, f_price, f_cover_real_name, f_description_real_name, f_video_real_name, f_created_time, f_modified_time, f_del_flag, f_classification, f_profit_share, f_status, f_cover_name, f_description_name, f_video_name, f_free_watch_time
mapper.insert: insert into t_video (f_id, f_title, f_subtitle, f_price, f_cover_real_name, f_description_real_name, f_video_real_name, f_created_time, f_modified_time, f_del_flag, f_classification, f_profit_share, f_status, f_cover_name, f_description_name, f_video_name, f_free_watch_time) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{subtitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{price,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{coverRealName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{descriptionRealName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{videoRealName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createdTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modifiedTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{delFlag,jdbcType=BIT}, #{classification,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{profitShare,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{coverName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{descriptionName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{videoName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{freeWatchTime,jdbcType=INTEGER})

insert into t_video
f_id,
f_title,
f_subtitle,
f_price,
f_cover_real_name,
f_description_real_name,
f_video_real_name,
f_created_time,
f_modified_time,
f_del_flag,
f_classification,
f_profit_share,
f_status,
f_cover_name,
f_description_name,
f_video_name,
f_free_watch_time,
#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{subtitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{price,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{coverRealName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{descriptionRealName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{videoRealName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{createdTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{modifiedTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{delFlag,jdbcType=BIT},
#{classification,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{profitShare,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{coverName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{descriptionName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{videoName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{freeWatchTime,jdbcType=INTEGER},
mapper.update:
update t_video
f_title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
f_subtitle = #{subtitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
f_price = #{price,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
f_cover_real_name = #{coverRealName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
f_description_real_name = #{descriptionRealName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
f_video_real_name = #{videoRealName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
f_created_time = #{createdTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
f_modified_time = #{modifiedTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
f_del_flag = #{delFlag,jdbcType=BIT},
f_classification = #{classification,jdbcType=BIGINT},
f_profit_share = #{profitShare,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
f_status = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
f_cover_name = #{coverName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
f_description_name = #{descriptionName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
f_video_name = #{videoName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
f_free_watch_time = #{freeWatchTime,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where f_id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update t_video set f_title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, f_subtitle = #{subtitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, f_price = #{price,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, f_cover_real_name = #{coverRealName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, f_description_real_name = #{descriptionRealName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, f_video_real_name = #{videoRealName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, f_created_time = #{createdTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, f_modified_time = #{modifiedTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, f_del_flag = #{delFlag,jdbcType=BIT}, f_classification = #{classification,jdbcType=BIGINT}, f_profit_share = #{profitShare,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, f_status = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, f_cover_name = #{coverName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, f_description_name = #{descriptionName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, f_video_name = #{videoName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, f_free_watch_time = #{freeWatchTime,jdbcType=INTEGER} where f_id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select v.f_id, v.f_title, v.f_subtitle, v.f_price, v.f_cover_real_name, v.f_description_real_name, v.f_video_real_name, v.f_created_time, v.f_modified_time, v.f_del_flag, v.f_classification, v.f_profit_share, v.f_status, v.f_cover_name, v.f_description_name, v.f_video_name, v.f_free_watch_time, vc.f_v_name as f_classification_name, (select count(1) from t_statistics s where s.f_statistics_type = '003003' and s.f_business_id = v.f_id) as f_watched, (select count(1) from t_statistics s where s.f_statistics_type = '003004' and s.f_business_id = v.f_id) as f_purchased, (select count(1) from t_statistics s where s.f_statistics_type = '003005' and s.f_business_id = v.f_id) as f_accessed from t_video v left join t_video_classification vc on v.f_classification = vc.f_id where v.f_id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

select v.f_id, v.f_title, v.f_subtitle, v.f_price, v.f_cover_real_name, v.f_description_real_name, v.f_video_real_name, v.f_created_time, v.f_modified_time, v.f_del_flag, v.f_classification, v.f_profit_share, v.f_status, v.f_cover_name, v.f_description_name, v.f_video_name, v.f_free_watch_time, vc.f_v_name as f_classification_name, (select count(1) from t_statistics s where s.f_statistics_type = '003003' and s.f_business_id = v.f_id and s.f_user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}) as f_watched, (select count(1) from t_statistics s where s.f_statistics_type = '003004' and s.f_business_id = v.f_id and s.f_user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}) as f_purchased, (select count(1) from t_statistics s where s.f_statistics_type = '003005' and s.f_business_id = v.f_id and s.f_user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}) as f_accessed ,(case when o.f_id is null then false else true end) as f_is_purchased ,o.f_user_id from t_video v left join t_video_classification vc on v.f_classification = vc.f_id join t_order o on v.f_id = o.goods_id and o.f_order_status = '004002' and o.f_user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT} where v.f_del_flag = 0 and v.f_status = '001003' and o.f_user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

select v.f_id, v.f_title, v.f_subtitle, v.f_price, v.f_cover_real_name, v.f_description_real_name, v.f_video_real_name, v.f_created_time, v.f_modified_time, v.f_del_flag, v.f_classification, v.f_profit_share, v.f_status, v.f_cover_name, v.f_description_name, v.f_video_name, v.f_free_watch_time, vc.f_v_name as f_classification_name, (select count(1) from t_statistics s where s.f_statistics_type = '003003' and s.f_business_id = v.f_id) as f_watched, (select count(1) from t_statistics s where s.f_statistics_type = '003004' and s.f_business_id = v.f_id) as f_purchased, (select count(1) from t_statistics s where s.f_statistics_type = '003005' and s.f_business_id = v.f_id) as f_accessed, true as f_is_purchased, true as f_is_white_user from t_video v left join t_video_classification vc on v.f_classification = vc.f_id where v.f_id = #{videoId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

select v.f_id, v.f_title, v.f_subtitle, v.f_price, v.f_cover_real_name, v.f_description_real_name, v.f_video_real_name, v.f_create_time, v.f_update_time, v.f_del_flag, v.f_classification, v.f_profit_share, v.f_status, v.f_cover_name, v.f_description_name, v.f_video_name, v.f_free_watch_time, vc.f_v_name as f_classification_name, 0 as f_watched, 0 as f_purchased, 0 as f_accessed, true as f_is_purchased from t_video v left join t_video_classification vc on v.f_classification = vc.id where v.f_del_flag = 0 and v.f_status = '001003'
